title: Loon Cafe's Dirty Pork Stew
directions: In a large Dutch oven or heavy stew pot, brown pork in the oil until it is well-browned and cooked through.

Combine the onion, chiles, tomatoes, jalapenos, garlic, beer, cumin, chili powder, black pepper, sugar, salt, hot pepper sauce, chicken base, beef base, onion powder, and green onions; add to the browned pork, add just enough water to cover if needed.
Cook at a low simmer for about 1-1/2 hours, or until meat is tender.
ingredients: 2 lbs. lean pork, cut into 1-inch cubes
1 tbsp. chicken base or 4 chicken bouillon cubes
1 tbsp. beef base or 4 beef bouillon cubes
1 cup sliced green onions, whites and greens
